name: Chessy
description:
Please, Look down pictures  until playing :) and read all) You need to destroy the king or capture the castle   You have units and buildings.  Units have abilities   King and Pawn = Melee   Rook and Bishop = Archers COME IN  DISCORD FOR FINDING ENEMY AND FRIEND:  Discord I still have a small online in the game. I hope it will grow up. I always can play with you  You can play so with friend. Open the second page  IN NEW BROWSE! Or You'll have a delay in game.  The game is in development and you want support game: Support Game How Truce System Works? Game Play:

There will be a queen, a hero and many other buildings and abilities) The game is in development and you want support game: Support Game
